raw_body: RATNAYAKE – R.M.A. – It is with great sadness we announce the demise of R.M.A. Ratnayake. Beloved husband of Mrs B.M. Ratnayake,​ loving father of Samantha Ratnayake (KLM,​ Netherlands) and Asanka Ratnayake (Hayley’s Adventis),​ father-in-law of Chithrangani Ratnayake and grandfather of Janisha Ratnayake. Remains lie at “The Respect Home” By Jayaratne’s from 9.00 a.m. on 4th September to 4.00 p.m. on 5th September 2023. Cortege leaves for cremation at (New Section) on 5th September 2023 at 4.30 p.m.055887
